synonyms.synonym: SubName: Glyoxylate reductase/hydroxypyruvate reductase, isoform CRA_b
SubName: cDNA, FLJ96788, Homo sapiens glyoxylate reductase/hydroxypyruvate reductase(GRHPR), mRNA

protein.general_function: Involved in oxidoreductase activity, acting on the CH-OH group of donors, NAD or NADP as acceptor
protein.specific_function: Enzyme with hydroxy-pyruvate reductase, glyoxylate reductase and D-glycerate dehydrogenase enzymatic activities. Reduces hydroxypyruvate to D-glycerate, glyoxylate to glycolate oxidizes D-glycerate to hydroxypyruvate.

go_class.description: oxidoreductase activity, acting on ch-oh group of donors
oxidoreductase activity, acting on the ch-oh group of donors, nad or nadp as acceptor

reference.reference_text: Rumsby G, Cregeen DP: Identification and expression of a cDNA for human hydroxypyruvate/glyoxylate reductase. Biochim Biophys Acta. 1999 Sep 3;1446(3):383-8.
